short_summary: STANDING OFFER FOR THE SUPPLY OF GROCERY PRODUCTS
description: STANDING OFFER FOR SUPPLY UNDER THE PROCUREMENT CATEGORY GOODS AND SERVICES FOR DEPARTMENT DEFENCE WITH PROCUREMENT CATEGORY GD WITH EXPECTED CONTRACT START DATE 2023-06-01 AND EXPECTED CONTRACT END DATE 2023-11-30
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RISO) 
## RISO Tender Number: W0134-23R005

### Tender Details
**Tender Reference Number:** WS3941225772-Doc3941397035
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** WS3941225772
**Publication Date:** April 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 12, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
**Amendment Date:** April 20, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2023

### Tender Status
**Tender Status:** Expired

### Procurement Details
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Contract Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites bidders to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply, delivery, and offloading of various grocery products on an as-and-when-required basis to 4 Wing Cold Lake located at Cold Lake, Alberta.

### Key Requirements
* Supply a range of grocery products, including meat and poultry products, dairy products and eggs, prepared and preserved foods, fresh fruits, and fresh vegetables.
* Deliver and offload products to 4 Wing Cold Lake, Cold Lake, Alberta.
* Provide a standing offer for a period of [insert period] from the expected contract start date of June 1, 2023.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Jill Aquino, Public Services and Procurement Canada
Telephone: [insert telephone number if available]
Email: [jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Please note that the contact information above is subject to change.

### Notice
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 12, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
